channel.title: Abouts on OrionUO: Ultima Online
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on OrionUO: Ultima Online

item.title: About the Project
item.description: OrionUO is an Open Source Ultima Online® client, written from scratch for Windows by Hotride and ported to Linux and MacOSX by fungos. The project is currently maintained by fungos and Deuce. The project aims to have a fully open Ultima Online® client compatible with different eras from the game. The Orion Suite is composed of the game client, the game launcher and updater and (for the foreseeable future) a closed source scriptable game assistant similar to Razor Assitant.
